name: Font Awesome Official Icon Component (Free + Pro)
description:
Updated: February 2022. There are some changes to this new version that aren't backwards compatible. If replacing existing component instances, please be cautious.


An official Font Awesome icon component that uses OTF files and ligatures to make adding icons (and swapping styles) simple and easy.


Includes components for:

  • Font Awesome 6 Pro
  • Font Awesome 6 Free
  • Font Awesome 5 Pro
  • Font Awesome 5 Free


Features:

  • All Font Awesome styles (except Duotone)
  • Padding options: none | fixed-width | square | roomy
  • Multiple sizes: 1x | 1.25x | 1.5x | 2x | 2.5x | 3x | 4x | 5x | 6x | 7x | 8x | 9x | 10x


How to Use:

  • Download the "desktop" files for your chosen version of Font Awesome.
  • Install the included OTF files into your font manager.
  • Use the component! There are four components in the file (6 Pro, 6 Free, 5 Pro, 5 Free).
  • To change the icon in the component, use Figma's text selection tool (keyboard shortcut is T), double-click into the icon component, and then type your desired icon name. (See it in action here.)


Pick the Right Icon:

  • Explore icons here: https://fontawesome.com/icons
